name: Lose a Letter Lexicon Ladder Pt 10 Quiz / Test | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.
First word of six letters -

Drinking receptacle with a stem and base

Second word of five letters - 

Representation of planet Earth

Third word of four letters -

Stare in an amorous or lecherous manner

Fourth word of three letters -

Conceit or self esteem

Fifth word of two letters -

Depart

A new word of seven letters -

Description or explanation accompanying photograph or illustration

Second word of six letters -

Activity to accomplish an objective

Third word of five letters - 

Invigorating medication

Forth word of four letters -

Metal money

Fifth word of three letters -

Electrically charged atom
